   20: -module(application_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   24: 
   25: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   26: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2
   27:      ]).
   28: 
   29: -export([failover/1, failover_comp/1, permissions/1, load/1,
   30: 	 load_use_cache/1,
   31: 	 otp_1586/1, otp_2078/1, otp_2012/1, otp_2718/1, otp_2973/1,
   32: 	 otp_3002/1, otp_3184/1, otp_4066/1, otp_4227/1, otp_5363/1,
   33: 	 otp_5606/1,
   34: 	 start_phases/1, get_key/1, get_env/1, get_supervisor/1,
   35: 	 set_env/1, set_env_persistent/1, set_env_errors/1, optional_applications/1,
   36: 	 permit_false_start_local/1, permit_false_start_dist/1, script_start/1, 
   37: 	 nodedown_start/1, init2973/0, loop2973/0, loop5606/1, otp_16504/1]).
   38: 
   39: -export([config_change/1, persistent_env/1, invalid_app_file/1,
   40: 	 distr_changed_tc1/1, distr_changed_tc2/1,
   41: 	 ensure_started/1, ensure_all_started/1,
   42: 	 shutdown_func/1, do_shutdown/1, shutdown_timeout/1,
   43:          shutdown_application_call/1,shutdown_deadlock/1,
   44:          config_relative_paths/1, handle_many_config_files/1,
   45:          format_log_1/1, format_log_2/1,
   46:          configfd_bash/1, configfd_port_program/1]).
   47: 
   48: -define(TESTCASE, testcase_name).
   49: -define(testcase, proplists:get_value(?TESTCASE, Config)).
   50: 
   51: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2, start_type/0, 
   52: 	 start_phase/0, conf_change/0]).
   53: 
   54: suite() ->
   55:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   56:      {timetrap,{minutes,2}}].
   57: 
   58: all() -> 
   59:     [failover, failover_comp, permissions, load,
   60:      load_use_cache, ensure_started, {group, reported_bugs}, start_phases,
   61:      script_start, nodedown_start, permit_false_start_local,
   62:      permit_false_start_dist, get_key, get_env, ensure_all_started,
   63:      set_env, set_env_persistent, set_env_errors, get_supervisor,
   64:      {group, distr_changed}, config_change, shutdown_func, shutdown_timeout,
   65:      shutdown_application_call, shutdown_deadlock, config_relative_paths, optional_applications,
   66:      persistent_env, handle_many_config_files, format_log_1, format_log_2,
   67:      configfd_bash, configfd_port_program, invalid_app_file].
   68: 
   69: groups() -> 
   70:     [{reported_bugs, [],
   71:       [otp_1586, otp_2078, otp_2012, otp_2718, otp_2973,
   72:        otp_3002, otp_3184, otp_4066, otp_4227, otp_5363,
   73:        otp_5606, otp_16504]},
   74:      {distr_changed, [],
   75:       [distr_changed_tc1, distr_changed_tc2]}].
   76: 
   77: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   78:     Config.
   79: 
   80: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   81:     ok.
   82: 
   83: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   84:     Config.
   85: 
   86: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   87:     Config.
   88: 
   89: 
   90: 
   91: init_per_testcase(otp_2973=Case, Config) ->
   92:     code:add_path(proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config)),
   93:     [{?TESTCASE, Case}|Config];
   94: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   95:     [{?TESTCASE, Case}|Config].
   96: 
   97: end_per_testcase(otp_2973, Config) ->
   98:     code:del_path(proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config)),
   99:     ok;
  100: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
  101:     ok.
  102: 
  103: -define(UNTIL(Seq), loop_until_true(fun() -> Seq end)).
  104: 
  105: -record(st, {
  106:           normal = 0,
  107:           local = 0,
  108:           takeover = 0,
  109:           failover = 0
  110:          }).
  111: 
  112: loop_until_true(Fun) ->
  113:     case Fun() of
  114: 	true ->
  115: 	    ok;
  116: 	_ ->
  117: 	    timer:sleep(100),
  118: 	    loop_until_true(Fun)
  119:     end.
  120: 
  121: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  122: %% Should be started in a CC view with:
  123: %% erl -sname XXX -rsh ctrsh where XX not in [cp1, cp2, cp3]
  124: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  125: %% Tests failover and takeover for distributed applications.  Tests
  126: %% start, load etc implicitly.
  127: failover(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  128:     %% start a help process to check the start type
  129:     StPid = spawn_link(?MODULE, start_type, []),
  130:     yes = global:register_name(st_type, StPid),
  131: 
  132:     NodeNames = [Ncp1, Ncp2, Ncp3] = node_names([cp1, cp2, cp3], Conf),
  133:     NoSyncTime = config_fun_fast(config_fo(NodeNames)),
  134:     WithSyncTime = config_fun(config_fo(NodeNames)),
  135: 
  136:     %% Test [cp1, cp2, cp3]
  137:     {ok, Cp1} = start_node_config(Ncp1, NoSyncTime, Conf),
  138:     {ok, Cp2} = start_node_config(Ncp2, NoSyncTime, Conf),
  139:     {ok, Cp3} = start_node_config(Ncp3, WithSyncTime, Conf),
  140:     Cps = [Cp1, Cp2, Cp3],
  141:     wait_for_ready_net(),
  142: 
  143:     %% Start app1 and make sure cp1 starts it
  144:     {[ok,ok,ok],[]} = 
  145:         rpc:multicall(Cps, application, load, [app1()]),
  146:     ?UNTIL(is_loaded(app1, Cps)),
  147:     {[ok,ok,ok],[]} = 
  148:         rpc:multicall(Cps, application, start, [app1, permanent]),
  149:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app1, Cp1)),
  150:     false = is_started(app1, Cp2),
  151:     ok = get_start_type(#st{normal = 3}),
  152: 
  153:     %% Stop cp1 and make sure cp2 starts app1
  154:     stop_node_nice(Cp1),
  155:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app1, Cp2)),
  156:     ok = get_start_type(#st{normal = 3}),
  157: 
  158:     %% Restart cp1 and make sure it restarts app1
  159:     {ok, Cp1_2} = start_node_config(Ncp1, NoSyncTime, Conf),
  160:     global:sync(),
  161:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1_2, application, load, [app1()]),
  162:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1_2, application, start, [app1, permanent]),
  163:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app1, Cp1)),
  164:     ?UNTIL(not is_started(app1, Cp2)),
  165:     ok = get_start_type(#st{takeover = 3}),
  166: 
  167:     %% Test [{cp1, cp2}, cp3]
  168:     %% Start app_sp and make sure cp2 starts it (cp1 has more apps started)
  169:     {[ok,ok,ok],[]} =
  170:         rpc:multicall([Cp1_2, Cp2, Cp3], application, load, [app_sp()]),
  171:     {[ok,ok,ok],[]} = 
  172:         rpc:multicall([Cp1_2, Cp2, Cp3], application, start,[app_sp,permanent]),
  173:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app_sp, Cp2)),
  174:     false = is_started(app_sp, Cp1),
  175:     false = is_started(app_sp, Cp3),
  176:     ok = get_start_type(#st{normal = 3}),
  177: 	
  178:     %% Stop cp2 and make sure cp1 starts app_sp
  179:     stop_node_nice(Cp2),
  180:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app_sp, Cp1_2)),
  181:     ok = get_start_type(#st{failover = 3}),
  182: 	
  183:     %% Stop cp1 and make sure cp3 starts app_sp
  184:     stop_node_nice(Cp1_2),
  185:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app_sp, Cp3)),
  186:     ok = get_start_type(#st{normal = 3, failover = 3}),
  187: 
  188:     %% Restart cp2 and make sure it restarts app_sp
  189:     {ok, Cp2_2} = start_node_config(Ncp2, NoSyncTime, Conf),
  190:     global:sync(),
  191:     ok = rpc:call(Cp2_2, application, load, [app_sp()]),
  192:     ok = rpc:call(Cp2_2, application, start, [app_sp, permanent]),
  193:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app_sp, Cp2_2)),
  194:     ?UNTIL(not is_started(app_sp, Cp3)),
  195:     ok = get_start_type(#st{takeover = 3}),
  196: 
  197:     %% Restart cp1 and make sure it doesn't restart app_sp
  198:     {ok, Cp1_3} = start_node_config(Ncp1, NoSyncTime, Conf),
  199:     global:sync(),
  200:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1_3, application, load, [app_sp()]),
  201:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1_3, application, start, [app_sp, permanent]),
  202:     ct:sleep(500),
  203:     false = is_started(app_sp, Cp1_3),
  204:     true = is_started(app_sp, Cp2_2),
  205: 
  206:     %% Force takeover to cp1
  207:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1_3, application, takeover, [app_sp, permanent]),
  208:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app_sp, Cp1_3)),
  209:     ?UNTIL(not is_started(app_sp, Cp2_2)),
  210:     ok = get_start_type(#st{takeover = 3}),
  211: 
  212:     %% Kill one child process and see that it is started with type local
  213:     PP = global:whereis_name({ch,3}),
  214:     exit(PP, kill),
  215:     ok = get_start_type(#st{local = 1}),
  216: 
  217:     global:send(st_type, kill),
  218: 
  219:     stop_node_nice(Cp1_3),
  220:     stop_node_nice(Cp2_2),
  221:     stop_node_nice(Cp3),
  222:     ok.
  223:     
  224: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  225: %% Should be started in a CC view with:
  226: %% erl -sname XXX -rsh ctrsh where XX not in [cp1, cp2, cp3]
  227: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  228: %% Tests failover and takeover for distributed applications.  Tests
  229: %% start, load etc implicitly. The applications do not use start_phases
  230: %% i.e. the failover should be transferred to normal start type.
  231: failover_comp(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  232:     %% start a help process to check the start type
  233:     StPid = spawn_link(?MODULE, start_type, []),
  234:     yes = global:register_name(st_type, StPid),
  235: 
  236:     NodeNames = [Ncp1, Ncp2, Ncp3] = node_names([cp1, cp2, cp3], Conf),
  237:     NoSyncTime = config_fun_fast(config(NodeNames)),
  238:     WithSyncTime = config_fun(config(NodeNames)),
  239: 
  240:     %% Test [cp1, cp2, cp3]
  241:     {ok, Cp1} = start_node_config(Ncp1, NoSyncTime, Conf),
  242:     {ok, Cp2} = start_node_config(Ncp2, NoSyncTime, Conf),
  243:     {ok, Cp3} = start_node_config(Ncp3, WithSyncTime, Conf),
  244:     Cps = [Cp1, Cp2, Cp3],
  245:     wait_for_ready_net(),
  246: 
  247:     %% Start app1 and make sure cp1 starts it
  248:     {[ok,ok,ok],[]} = 
  249:         rpc:multicall(Cps, application, load, [app1()]),
  250:     ?UNTIL(is_loaded(app1, Cps)),
  251:     {[ok,ok,ok],[]} = 
  252:         rpc:multicall(Cps, application, start, [app1, permanent]),
  253:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app1, Cp1)),
  254:     false = is_started(app1, Cp2),
  255:     ok = get_start_type(#st{normal = 3}),
  256: 
  257:     %% Stop cp1 and make sure cp2 starts app1
  258:     stop_node_nice(Cp1),
  259:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app1, Cp2)),
  260:     ok = get_start_type(#st{normal = 3}),
  261: 
  262:     %% Restart cp1 and make sure it restarts app1
  263:     {ok, Cp1_2} = start_node_config(Ncp1, NoSyncTime, Conf),
  264:     global:sync(),
  265:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1_2, application, load, [app1()]),
  266:     ?UNTIL(is_loaded(app1, Cp1_2)),
  267:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1_2, application, start, [app1, permanent]),
  268:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app1, Cp1_2)),
  269:     ?UNTIL(not is_started(app1, Cp2)),
  270:     ok = get_start_type(#st{takeover = 3}),
  271: 
  272:     %% Test [{cp1, cp2}, cp3]
  273:     %% Start app3 and make sure cp2 starts it (cp1 has more apps started)
  274:     {[ok,ok,ok],[]} =
  275:         rpc:multicall([Cp1_2, Cp2, Cp3], application, load, [app3()]),
  276:     ?UNTIL(is_loaded(app3, [Cp1_2, Cp2, Cp3])),
  277:     {[ok,ok,ok],[]} = 
  278:         rpc:multicall([Cp1_2, Cp2, Cp3], application, start,[app3,permanent]),
  279:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app3, Cp2)),
  280:     false = is_started(app3, Cp1),
  281:     false = is_started(app3, Cp3),
  282:     ok = get_start_type(#st{normal = 3}),
  283: 	
  284:     %% Stop cp2 and make sure cp1 starts app3
  285:     stop_node_nice(Cp2),
  286:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app3, Cp1_2)),
  287:     ok = get_start_type(#st{normal = 3}),
  288: 	
  289:     %% Stop cp1 and make sure cp3 starts app3
  290:     stop_node_nice(Cp1_2),
  291:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app3, Cp3)),
  292:     ok = get_start_type(#st{normal = 6}),
  293: 
  294:     %% Restart cp2 and make sure it restarts app3
  295:     {ok, Cp2_2} = start_node_config(Ncp2, NoSyncTime, Conf),
  296:     global:sync(),
  297:     ok = rpc:call(Cp2_2, application, load, [app3()]),
  298:     ?UNTIL(is_loaded(app3, Cp2_2)),
  299:     ok = rpc:call(Cp2_2, application, start, [app3, permanent]),
  300:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app3, Cp2_2)),
  301:     ?UNTIL(not is_started(app3, Cp3)),
  302:     ok = get_start_type(#st{takeover = 3}),
  303: 
  304:     %% Restart cp1 and make sure it doesn't restart app3
  305:     {ok, Cp1_3} = start_node_config(Ncp1, NoSyncTime, Conf),
  306:     global:sync(),
  307:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1_3, application, load, [app3()]),
  308:     true = is_loaded(app3, Cp1_3),
  309:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1_3, application, start, [app3, permanent]),
  310:     ct:sleep(5000),
  311:     false = is_started(app3, Cp1_3),
  312:     true = is_started(app3, Cp2_2),
  313: 
  314:     %% Force takeover to cp1
  315:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1_3, application, takeover, [app3, permanent]),
  316:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app3, Cp1_3)),
  317:     ?UNTIL(not is_started(app3, Cp2_2)),
  318:     ok = get_start_type(#st{takeover = 3}),
  319: 
  320:     %% Kill one child process and see that it is started with type local
  321:     PP = global:whereis_name({ch,3}),
  322:     exit(PP, kill),
  323:     ok = get_start_type(#st{local = 1}),
  324: 
  325:     global:send(st_type, kill),
  326: 
  327:     stop_node_nice(Cp1_3),
  328:     stop_node_nice(Cp2_2),
  329:     stop_node_nice(Cp3),
  330:     ok.
  331: 
  332: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  333: %% Should be started in a CC view with:
  334: %% erl -sname XXX -rsh ctrsh where XX not in [cp1, cp2, cp3]
  335: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  336: %% Tests permissions for distributed applications.
  337: permissions(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  338: 
  339:     NodeNames = [Ncp1, Ncp2, Ncp3] = node_names([cp1, cp2, cp3], Conf),
  340:     NoSyncTime = config_fun_fast(config2(NodeNames)),
  341:     WithSyncTime = config_fun(config2(NodeNames)),
  342: 
  343:     %% Test [cp1, cp2, cp3]
  344:     {ok, Cp1} = start_node_config(Ncp1, NoSyncTime, Conf),
  345:     {ok, Cp2} = start_node_config(Ncp2, NoSyncTime, Conf),
  346:     {ok, Cp3} = start_node_config(Ncp3, WithSyncTime, Conf),
  347:     Cps = [Cp1, Cp2, Cp3],
  348:     wait_for_ready_net(),
  349: 
  350:     %% Start app1 and make sure cp1 starts it
  351:     {[ok,ok,ok],[]} =
  352:         rpc:multicall(Cps, application, load, [app1()]),
  353:     ?UNTIL(is_loaded(app1, Cps)),
  354:     {[ok,ok,ok],[]} =
  355:         rpc:multicall(Cps, application, start, [app1, permanent]),
  356:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app1, Cp1)),
  357:     false = is_started(app1, Cp2),
  358: 
  359:     %% Unpermit app1 on cp1, make sure cp2 starts it
  360:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, permit, [app1, false]),
  361:     false = is_started(app1, Cp1),
  362:     true = is_started(app1, Cp2),
  363: 
  364:     %% Unpermit app1 on cp2, make sure cp3 starts it
  365:     ok = rpc:call(Cp2, application, permit, [app1, false]),
  366:     false = is_started(app1, Cp1),
  367:     false = is_started(app1, Cp2),
  368:     true = is_started(app1, Cp3),
  369: 
  370:     %% Permit cp2 again
  371:     ok = rpc:call(Cp2, application, permit, [app1, true]),
  372:     false = is_started(app1, Cp1),
  373:     false = is_started(app1, Cp3),
  374:     true = is_started(app1, Cp2),
  375: 
  376:     %% Start app3, make sure no one starts it
  377:     {[ok,ok,ok],[]} = 
  378:         rpc:multicall(Cps, application, load, [app3()]),
  379:     ?UNTIL(is_loaded(app3, Cps)),
  380:     {[ok,ok,ok],[]} = 
  381:         rpc:multicall(Cps, application, start, [app3, permanent]),
  382:     ct:sleep(1000),
  383:     false = is_started(app3, Cp1),
  384:     false = is_started(app3, Cp2),
  385:     false = is_started(app3, Cp3),
  386: 
  387:     %% Permit app3 on Cp3
  388:     ok = rpc:call(Cp3, application, permit, [app3, true]),
  389:     true = is_started(app3, Cp3),
  390: 
  391:     %% Permit app3 on Cp2, make sure it starts it
  392:     ok = rpc:call(Cp2, application, permit, [app3, true]),
  393:     true = is_started(app3, Cp2),
  394:     false = is_started(app3, Cp3),
  395: 
  396:     %% Permit app3 on Cp1, make sure it doesn't start it
  397:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, permit, [app3, true]),
  398:     false = is_started(app3, Cp1),
  399:     true = is_started(app3, Cp2),
  400:     false = is_started(app3, Cp3),
  401: 
  402:     %% Stop Cp2, make sure Cp1 starts app3
  403:     stop_node_nice(Cp2),
  404:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app3, Cp1)),
  405: 
  406:     stop_node_nice(Cp1),
  407:     stop_node_nice(Cp3),
  408:     ok.
  409: 
  410: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  411: %% Should be started in a CC view with:
  412: %% erl -sname XXX -rsh ctrsh where XX not in [cp1, cp2, cp3]
  413: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  414: %% Tests loading of distributed applications.
  415: load(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  416:     NodeNames = [Ncp1, Ncp2, Ncp3] = node_names([cp1, cp2, cp3], Conf),
  417:     NoSyncTime = config_fun_fast(config3(NodeNames)),
  418:     WithSyncTime = config_fun(config3(NodeNames)),
  419: 
  420:     %% Test [cp1, cp2, cp3]
  421:     {ok, Cp1} = start_node_config(Ncp1, NoSyncTime, Conf),
  422:     {ok, Cp2} = start_node_config(Ncp2, NoSyncTime, Conf),
  423:     {ok, Cp3} = start_node_config(Ncp3, WithSyncTime, Conf),
  424:     Cps = [Cp1, Cp2, Cp3],
  425:     wait_for_ready_net(),
  426: 
  427:     {[ok,ok,ok],[]} = 
  428:         rpc:multicall(Cps, application, load, [app1(), d1(NodeNames)]),
  429:     ?UNTIL(is_loaded(app1, Cps)),
  430:     {[ok,ok,ok],[]} = 
  431:         rpc:multicall(Cps, application, start, [app1, permanent]),
  432:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app1, Cp1)),
  433:     false = is_started(app1, Cp2),
  434:     false = is_started(app1, Cp3),
  435: 
  436:     %% Load app1 with different specs and make sure we get an error
  437:     {[{error,_},{error,_}],[]} = 
  438:         rpc:multicall([Cp1, Cp2], application, load, [app1(), d1(NodeNames)]),
  439:     {error, _} = rpc:call(Cp3, application, load, [app1(), d2(NodeNames)]),
  440: 
  441:     stop_node_nice(Cp1),
  442:     stop_node_nice(Cp2),
  443:     stop_node_nice(Cp3),
  444:     ok.
  445:     
  446: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  447: %% Same test as load/1, only with code path cache enabled.
  448: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  449: %% Tests loading of distributed applications. Code path cache enabled.
  450: load_use_cache(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  451:     NodeNames = [Ncp1, Ncp2, Ncp3] = node_names([cp1, cp2, cp3], Conf),
  452:     NoSyncTime = config_fun_fast(config3(NodeNames)),
  453:     WithSyncTime = config_fun(config3(NodeNames)),
  454: 
  455:     %% Test [cp1, cp2, cp3]
  456:     {ok, Cp1} = start_node_with_cache(Ncp1, NoSyncTime, Conf),
  457:     {ok, Cp2} = start_node_with_cache(Ncp2, NoSyncTime, Conf),
  458:     {ok, Cp3} = start_node_with_cache(Ncp3, WithSyncTime, Conf),
  459:     Cps = [Cp1, Cp2, Cp3],
  460:     wait_for_ready_net(),
  461: 
  462:     {[ok,ok,ok],[]} = 
  463:         rpc:multicall(Cps, application, load, [app1(), d1(NodeNames)]),
  464:     ?UNTIL(is_loaded(app1, Cps)),
  465:     {[ok,ok,ok],[]} = 
  466:         rpc:multicall(Cps, application, start, [app1, permanent]),
  467:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app1, Cp1)),
  468:     false = is_started(app1, Cp2),
  469: 
  470:     %% Load app1 with different specs and make sure we get an error
  471:     {[{error,_},{error,_}],[]} = 
  472:         rpc:multicall([Cp1, Cp2], application, load, [app1(), d1(NodeNames)]),
  473:     {error, _} = rpc:call(Cp3, application, load, [app1(), d2(NodeNames)]),
  474: 
  475:     stop_node_nice(Cp1),
  476:     stop_node_nice(Cp2),
  477:     stop_node_nice(Cp3),
  478:     ok.
  479: 
  480: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  481: %% Should be started in a CC view with:
  482: %% erl -sname XXX -rsh ctrsh where XX not in [cp1, cp2, cp3]
  483: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  484: %% Tests new start phases and failover.
  485: start_phases(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  486:     %% start a help process to check the start type
  487:     SpPid = spawn_link(?MODULE, start_phase, []),
  488:     yes = global:register_name(start_phase, SpPid),
  489: 
  490:     NodeNames = [Ncp1, _Ncp2, _Ncp3] = node_names([cp1, cp2, cp3], Conf),
  491:     WithSyncTime = config_fun(config_sf(NodeNames)),
  492: 
  493:     {ok, Cp1} = start_node_config_sf(Ncp1, WithSyncTime, Conf),
  494:     wait_for_ready_net(),
  495: 
  496:     %%=============================
  497:     %%Example 1 in the user's guide
  498:     %%=============================
  499:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, load, [myApp, 
  500:                                                  d_any3(myApp, NodeNames)]),
  501:     ?UNTIL(is_loaded(myApp, Cp1)),
  502:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, start, [myApp, permanent]),
  503:     ?UNTIL(is_started(myApp, Cp1)),
  504:     ok = get_start_phase({sp, 0, 1, 0, 0, 1}),
  505:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, stop, [myApp]),
  506: 
  507:     %%=============================
  508:     %%Example 2 in the user's guide
  509:     %%=============================
  510:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, load, [topApp, 
  511:                                                  d_any3(topApp, NodeNames)]),
  512:     ?UNTIL(is_loaded(topApp, Cp1)),
  513:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, start, [topApp, permanent]),
  514:     ?UNTIL(is_started(topApp, Cp1)),
  515:     ok = get_start_phase({sp, 0, 1, 0, 0, 1}),
  516:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, stop, [topApp]),
  517: 	
  518:     %%=============================
  519:     %%Example 3 in the user's guide
  520:     %%=============================
  521:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, load, [topApp2, 
  522:                                                  d_any3(topApp2, NodeNames)]),
  523:     ?UNTIL(is_loaded(topApp2, Cp1)),
  524:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, start, [topApp2, permanent]),
  525:     ?UNTIL(is_started(topApp2, Cp1)),
  526:     ok = get_start_phase({sp, 0, 2, 0, 0, 3}),
  527:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, stop, [topApp2]),
  528: 
  529:     %%=============================
  530:     %%Example 4 in the user's guide
  531:     %%=============================
  532:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, load, [topApp3, 
  533:                                                  d_any3(topApp3, NodeNames)]),
  534:     ?UNTIL(is_loaded(topApp3, Cp1)),
  535:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, start, [topApp3, permanent]),
  536:     ?UNTIL(is_started(topApp3, Cp1)),
  537:     ok = get_start_phase({sp, 1, 3, 3, 2, 4}),
  538:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, stop, [topApp3]),
  539: 	
  540:     global:send(start_phase, kill),
  541: 
  542:     stop_node_nice(Cp1),
  543:     ok.
  544: 
  545: 
  546: %% Start distributed applications from within a boot script.  Test
  547: %%  same as failover.
  548: script_start(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  549:     %% start a help process to check the start type
  550:     StPid = spawn_link(?MODULE, start_type, []),
  551:     yes = global:register_name(st_type, StPid),
  552: 
  553: 
  554:     %% Create the .app files and the boot script
  555:     ok = create_app(),
  556:     {{KernelVer,StdlibVer}, _} = create_script("latest"),
  557:     case is_real_system(KernelVer, StdlibVer) of
  558: 	      true ->
  559: 		  Options = [];
  560: 	      false  ->
  561: 		  Options = [local]
  562: 	  end,
  563:     ok = systools:make_script("latest", Options),
  564: 
  565:     NodeNames = [Ncp1, Ncp2, Ncp3] = node_names([cp1, cp2, cp3], Conf),
  566:     NoSyncTime = config_fun_fast(config_fo(NodeNames)),
  567:     WithSyncTime = config_fun(config_fo(NodeNames)),
  568: 
  569:     %% Test [cp1, cp2, cp3]
  570:     {ok, Cp1} = start_node_boot_config(Ncp1, NoSyncTime, Conf, latest),
  571:     {ok, Cp2} = start_node_boot_config(Ncp2, NoSyncTime, Conf, latest),
  572:     {ok, Cp3} = start_node_boot_config(Ncp3, WithSyncTime, Conf, latest),
  573:     wait_for_ready_net(),
  574: 
  575:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app1, Cp1)),
  576:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app2, Cp1)),
  577:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app_sp, Cp1)),
  578:     false = is_started(app1, Cp2),
  579:     ok = get_start_type(#st{normal = 9}),
  580: 
  581:     %% Stop cp1 and make sure cp2 starts app1, app2 normally (no
  582:     %% start_phases defined) and app_sp as failover (start_phases
  583:     %% defined)
  584:     stop_node_nice(Cp1),
  585:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app1, Cp2)),
  586:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app2, Cp2)),
  587:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app_sp, Cp2)),
  588:     ok = get_start_type(#st{normal = 6, failover = 3}),
  589: 	
  590:     %% Restart cp1, Cp1 takesover app1 and app2
  591:     {ok, Cp1_2} = start_node_boot_config(Ncp1, NoSyncTime, Conf, latest),
  592:     global:sync(),
  593:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app1, Cp1_2)),
  594:     false = is_started(app1, Cp2),
  595:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app2, Cp1_2)),
  596:     true = is_started(app_sp, Cp2),
  597:     ?UNTIL(not is_started(app1, Cp2)),
  598:     ?UNTIL(not is_started(app2, Cp2)),
  599:     ok = get_start_type(#st{takeover = 6}),
  600: 	
  601:     %% Stop cp2 and make sure cp1 starts app_sp.
  602:     false = is_started(app_sp, Cp1_2),
  603:     stop_node_nice(Cp2),
  604:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app_sp, Cp1_2)),
  605:     ok = get_start_type(#st{failover = 3}),
  606: 	
  607:     %% Stop cp1 and make sure cp3 starts app1, app2 and app_sp
  608:     stop_node_nice(Cp1_2),
  609:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app_sp, Cp3)),
  610:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app1, Cp3)),
  611:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app2, Cp3)),
  612:     ok = get_start_type(#st{normal = 6, failover = 3}),
  613: 	
  614:     %% Restart cp2 and make sure it takesover app1, app2 and app_sp
  615:     {ok, Cp2_2} = start_node_boot_config(Ncp2, NoSyncTime, Conf, latest),
  616:     global:sync(),
  617:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app_sp, Cp2_2)),
  618:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app1, Cp2_2)),
  619:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app2, Cp2_2)),
  620:     ?UNTIL(not is_started(app_sp, Cp3)),
  621:     ?UNTIL(not is_started(app1, Cp3)),
  622:     ?UNTIL(not is_started(app2, Cp3)),
  623:     ok = get_start_type(#st{takeover = 9}),
  624: 
  625:     %% Restart cp1 and make sure it takesover app1, app2
  626:     {ok, Cp1_3} = start_node_boot_config(Ncp1, NoSyncTime, Conf, latest),
  627:     global:sync(),
  628:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app1, Cp1_3)),
  629:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app2, Cp1_3)),
  630:     false = is_started(app_sp, Cp1_3),
  631:     true = is_started(app_sp, Cp2_2),
  632:     ?UNTIL(not is_started(app1, Cp2_2)),
  633:     ?UNTIL(not is_started(app2, Cp2_2)),
  634:     ok = get_start_type(#st{takeover = 6}),
  635: 
  636:     %% Force takeover to cp1
  637:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1_3, application, takeover, [app_sp, permanent]),
  638:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app_sp, Cp1_3)),
  639:     ?UNTIL(not is_started(app_sp, Cp2_2)),
  640:     ok = get_start_type(#st{takeover = 3}),
  641: 
  642:     %% Kill one child process and see that it is started with type local
  643:     PP = global:whereis_name({ch,3}),
  644:     exit(PP, kill),
  645:     ok = get_start_type(#st{local = 1}),
  646: 	
  647:     global:send(st_type, kill),
  648: 
  649:     stop_node_nice(Cp1_3),
  650:     stop_node_nice(Cp2_2),
  651:     stop_node_nice(Cp3),
  652:     
  653:     ok = file:delete("latest.boot"),
  654:     ok = file:delete("latest.rel"),
  655:     ok = file:delete("latest.script"),
  656: 
  657:     ok.
  658: 
  659: %% Start local applications with permission false.  Set
  660: %% permit true on different nodes.
  661: permit_false_start_local(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  662:     %% This configuration does not start dist_ac.
  663:     Config = write_config_file(fun config_perm/1, Conf),
  664: 
  665:     %% Test [cp1, cp2, cp3]
  666:     [Ncp1, Ncp2, Ncp3] = node_names([cp1, cp2, cp3], Conf),
  667:     {ok, Cp1} = start_node(Ncp1, Config),
  668:     {ok, Cp2} = start_node(Ncp2, Config),
  669:     {ok, Cp3} = start_node(Ncp3, Config),
  670:     wait_for_ready_net(),
  671: 
  672:     {[ok,ok,ok],[]} = 
  673:         rpc:multicall([Cp1, Cp2, Cp3], application, load, [app1()]),
  674:     {[ok,ok,ok],[]} = 
  675:         rpc:multicall([Cp1, Cp2, Cp3], application, start, [app1, permanent]),
  676:     {[ok,ok,ok],[]} = 
  677:         rpc:multicall([Cp1, Cp2, Cp3], application, load, [app2()]),
  678:     {[ok,ok,ok],[]} = 
  679:         rpc:multicall([Cp1, Cp2, Cp3], application, start, [app2, permanent]),
  680:     {[ok,ok,ok],[]} = 
  681:         rpc:multicall([Cp1, Cp2, Cp3], application, load, [app3()]),
  682: 
  683:     ct:sleep(1000),
  684:     false = is_started(app1, Cp1),
  685:     false = is_started(app1, Cp2),
  686:     false = is_started(app1, Cp3),
  687: 
  688:     %% Permit a not started application
  689:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, permit, [app3, true]),
  690:     ct:sleep(1000),
  691:     false = is_started(app3, Cp1),
  692:     false = is_started(app3, Cp2),
  693:     false = is_started(app3, Cp3),
  694: 
  695:     %% Permit a not loaded application
  696:     {error,{not_loaded,app_notloaded}} = 
  697: 	rpc:call(Cp1, application, permit, [app_notloaded, true]),
  698:     ct:sleep(1000),
  699:     false = is_started(app_notloaded, Cp1),
  700:     false = is_started(app_notloaded, Cp2),
  701:     false = is_started(app_notloaded, Cp3),
  702: 
  703:     %% Unpermit a not started application
  704:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, permit, [app3, false]),
  705:     ct:sleep(1000),
  706:     false = is_started(app3, Cp1),
  707:     false = is_started(app3, Cp2),
  708:     false = is_started(app3, Cp3),
  709: 
  710:     %% Unpermit a not loaded application
  711:     {error,{not_loaded,app_notloaded}} = 
  712: 	rpc:call(Cp1, application, permit, [app_notloaded, false]),
  713:     ct:sleep(1000),
  714:     false = is_started(app_notloaded, Cp1),
  715:     false = is_started(app_notloaded, Cp2),
  716:     false = is_started(app_notloaded, Cp3),
  717: 
  718:     %% Permit app1 on CP1 and make sure it is started
  719:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, permit, [app1, true]),
  720:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app1, Cp1)),
  721:     false = is_started(app1, Cp2),
  722:     false = is_started(app1, Cp3),
  723: 
  724:     %% Permit it again
  725:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, permit, [app1, true]),
  726:     ct:sleep(1000),
  727:     true = is_started(app1, Cp1),
  728:     false = is_started(app1, Cp2),
  729:     false = is_started(app1, Cp3),
  730: 
  731:     %% Permit app2 on CP1 and make sure it is started
  732:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, permit, [app2, true]),
  733:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app2, Cp1)),
  734:     false = is_started(app2, Cp2),
  735:     false = is_started(app2, Cp3),
  736: 
  737:     %% Permit app1 on CP2 and make sure it is started
  738:     ok = rpc:call(Cp2, application, permit, [app1, true]),
  739:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app1, Cp2)),
  740:     true = is_started(app1, Cp1),
  741:     false = is_started(app1, Cp3),
  742: 
  743:     %% Unpermit app1 on CP1 and make sure it is stopped
  744:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, permit, [app1, false]),
  745:     ?UNTIL(false =:= is_started(app1, Cp1)),
  746:     true = is_started(app1, Cp2),
  747:     false = is_started(app1, Cp3),
  748: 
  749:     %% Unpermit it again
  750:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, permit, [app1, false]),
  751:     ct:sleep(1000),
  752:     false = is_started(app1, Cp1),
  753:     true = is_started(app1, Cp2),
  754:     false = is_started(app1, Cp3),
  755: 
  756:     %% Permit app1 on CP1 and make sure it is started
  757:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, permit, [app1, true]),
  758:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app1, Cp1)),
  759:     true = is_started(app1, Cp2),
  760:     false = is_started(app1, Cp3),
  761: 
  762:     %% Unpermit app1 on CP1 and make sure it is stopped
  763:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, permit, [app1, false]),
  764:     ?UNTIL(false =:= is_started(app1, Cp1)),
  765:     true = is_started(app1, Cp2),
  766:     false = is_started(app1, Cp3),
  767: 
  768:     %% Unpermit app1 on CP2 and make sure it is stopped
  769:     ok = rpc:call(Cp2, application, permit, [app1, false]),
  770:     ct:sleep(1000),
  771:     ?UNTIL(false =:= is_started(app1, Cp2)),
  772:     false = is_started(app1, Cp1),
  773:     false = is_started(app1, Cp3),
  774: 
  775:     %% Unpermit app2 on CP1 and make sure it is stopped
  776:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, permit, [app2, false]),
  777:     ?UNTIL(false =:= is_started(app2, Cp2)),
  778:     false = is_started(app2, Cp1),
  779:     false = is_started(app2, Cp3),
  780: 
  781:     stop_node_nice(Cp1),
  782:     stop_node_nice(Cp2),
  783:     stop_node_nice(Cp3),
  784:     ok.
  785:     
  786: 
  787: %% Start distributed applications with permission false.  Set
  788: %% permit true on different nodes.
  789: permit_false_start_dist(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  790:     NodeNames = [Ncp1, Ncp2, Ncp3] = node_names([cp1, cp2, cp3], Conf),
  791:     NoSyncTime = config_fun_fast(config_perm2(NodeNames)),
  792:     WithSyncTime = config_fun(config_perm2(NodeNames)),
  793: 
  794:     %% Test [cp1, cp2, cp3]
  795:     {ok, Cp1} = start_node_config(Ncp1, NoSyncTime, Conf),
  796:     {ok, Cp2} = start_node_config(Ncp2, NoSyncTime, Conf),
  797:     {ok, Cp3} = start_node_config(Ncp3, WithSyncTime, Conf),
  798:     Cps = [Cp1, Cp2, Cp3],
  799:     wait_for_ready_net(),
  800: 
  801:     {[ok,ok,ok],[]} = 
  802:         rpc:multicall(Cps, application, load, [app1()]),
  803:     ?UNTIL(is_loaded(app1, Cps)),
  804:     {[ok,ok,ok],[]} = 
  805:         rpc:multicall(Cps, application, start, [app1, permanent]),
  806:     {[ok,ok,ok],[]} = 
  807:         rpc:multicall(Cps, application, load, [app2()]),
  808: 
  809:     ct:sleep(1000),
  810:     false = is_started(app1, Cp1),
  811:     false = is_started(app1, Cp2),
  812:     false = is_started(app1, Cp3),
  813: 
  814:     %% Permit a not started application
  815:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, permit, [app2, true]),
  816:     ct:sleep(1000),
  817:     false = is_started(app2, Cp1),
  818:     false = is_started(app2, Cp2),
  819:     false = is_started(app2, Cp3),
  820: 
  821:     %% Permit a not loaded application
  822:     {error,{not_loaded,app3}} = 
  823: 	rpc:call(Cp1, application, permit, [app3, true]),
  824:     ct:sleep(1000),
  825:     false = is_started(app3, Cp1),
  826:     false = is_started(app3, Cp2),
  827:     false = is_started(app3, Cp3),
  828: 
  829:     %% Unpermit a not started application
  830:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, permit, [app2, false]),
  831:     {[ok,ok,ok],[]} = 
  832:         rpc:multicall([Cp1, Cp2, Cp3], application, start, [app2, permanent]),
  833:     ct:sleep(1000),
  834:     false = is_started(app2, Cp1),
  835:     false = is_started(app2, Cp2),
  836:     false = is_started(app2, Cp3),
  837: 
  838:     %% Unpermit a not loaded application
  839:     {error,{not_loaded,app3}} = 
  840: 	rpc:call(Cp1, application, permit, [app3, false]),
  841:     {[ok,ok,ok],[]} = 
  842:         rpc:multicall(Cps, application, load, [app3()]),
  843:     ?UNTIL(is_loaded(app3, Cps)),
  844:     {[ok,ok,ok],[]} = 
  845:         rpc:multicall(Cps, application, start, [app3, permanent]),
  846:     ct:sleep(1000),
  847:     false = is_started(app3, Cp1),
  848:     false = is_started(app3, Cp2),
  849:     false = is_started(app3, Cp3),
  850: 
  851:     %% Permit app1 on CP1 and make sure it is started
  852:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, permit, [app1, true]),
  853:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app1, Cp1)),
  854:     false = is_started(app1, Cp2),
  855:     false = is_started(app1, Cp3),
  856: 
  857:     %% Permit it again
  858:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, permit, [app1, true]),
  859:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app1, Cp1)),
  860:     false = is_started(app1, Cp2),
  861:     false = is_started(app1, Cp3),
  862: 
  863:     %% Permit app2 on CP1 and make sure it is started
  864:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, permit, [app2, true]),
  865:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app2, Cp1)),
  866:     false = is_started(app2, Cp2),
  867:     false = is_started(app2, Cp3),
  868: 
  869:     %% Permit app1 on CP2 and make sure it is not started
  870:     ok = rpc:call(Cp2, application, permit, [app1, true]),
  871:     ct:sleep(1000),
  872:     true = is_started(app1, Cp1),
  873:     false = is_started(app1, Cp2),
  874:     false = is_started(app1, Cp3),
  875: 
  876:     %% Crash CP1 and make sure app1, but not app2, is started on CP2
  877:     stop_node_nice(Cp1),
  878:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app1, Cp2)),
  879:     false = is_started(app2, Cp2),
  880: 
  881:     %% Restart CP1 again, check nothing is running on it
  882:     {ok, Cp1_2} = start_node_config(Ncp1, NoSyncTime, Conf),
  883:     global:sync(),
  884:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1_2, application, load, [app1()]),
  885:     ?UNTIL(is_loaded(app1, Cp1_2)),
  886:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1_2, application, start, [app1, permanent]),
  887:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1_2, application, load, [app2()]),
  888:     ?UNTIL(is_loaded(app2, Cp1_2)),
  889:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1_2, application, start, [app2, permanent]),
  890:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1_2, application, load, [app3()]),
  891:     ?UNTIL(is_loaded(app3, Cp1_2)),
  892:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1_2, application, start, [app3, permanent]),
  893:     false = is_started(app1, Cp1_2),
  894:     false = is_started(app2, Cp1_2),
  895: 
  896:     %% Permit app3 on CP3 and make sure it is started
  897:     ok = rpc:call(Cp3, application, permit, [app3, true]),
  898:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app3, Cp3)),
  899:     false = is_started(app3, Cp1_2),
  900:     false = is_started(app3, Cp2),
  901: 
  902:     %% Permit app3 on CP1 and make sure it is moved there from CP3
  903:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1_2, application, permit, [app3, true]),
  904:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app3, Cp1_2)),
  905:     false = is_started(app3, Cp2),
  906:     false = is_started(app3, Cp3),
  907: 
  908:     %% Unpermit app3 on CP3 and CP1 and make sure it is stopped
  909:     ok = rpc:call(Cp3, application, permit, [app3, false]),
  910:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1_2, application, permit, [app3, false]),
  911:     ?UNTIL(false =:= is_started(app3, Cp1_2)),
  912:     false = is_started(app3, Cp2),
  913:     false = is_started(app3, Cp3),
  914: 
  915:     stop_node_nice(Cp1_2),
  916:     stop_node_nice(Cp2),
  917:     stop_node_nice(Cp3),
  918:     ok.
  919: 
  920: %% app1 distributed as [cp1, cp2].  Call application:start(app1) on
  921: %% cp2, but not on cp1.  Kill cp1.  Make sure app1 is started on cp2.
  922: nodedown_start(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  923:     NodeNames = [Ncp1, Ncp2] = node_names([cp1, cp2], Conf),
  924:     NoSyncTime = config_fun_fast(config4(NodeNames)),
  925:     WithSyncTime = config_fun(config4(NodeNames)),
  926: 
  927:     %% Test [cp1, cp2]
  928:     {ok, Cp1} = start_node_config(Ncp1, NoSyncTime, Conf),
  929:     {ok, Cp2} = start_node_config(Ncp2, WithSyncTime, Conf),
  930:     wait_for_ready_net(),
  931: 
  932:     %% Start app1 and make sure cp1 starts it
  933:     {[ok,ok],[]} = 
  934:         rpc:multicall([Cp1, Cp2], application, load, [app1()]),
  935:     _ = rpc:cast(Cp2, application, start, [app1, permanent]),
  936:     ct:sleep(1000),
  937: 
  938:     %% Crash CP1 and make sure app1 is started on CP2
  939:     stop_node_nice(Cp1),
  940:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app1, Cp2)),
  941:     
  942:     stop_node_nice(Cp2),
  943:     ok.
  944: 
  945: 
  946: %% Test application:ensure_started/1.
  947: ensure_started(_Conf) ->
  948: 
  949:     {ok, Fd} = file:open("app1.app", [write]),
  950:     w_app1(Fd),
  951:     file:close(Fd),
  952: 
  953:     ok = application:ensure_started(app1),
  954:     ok = application:ensure_started(app1),
  955:     {error, {already_started, app1}} = application:start(app1),
  956:     ok = application:stop(app1),
  957:     {error,{"no such file or directory", _ }} = application:ensure_started(hopefully_not_an_existing_app_file),
  958: 
  959:     ok = application:ensure_started(app1, permanent),
  960:     ok = application:ensure_started(app1, permanent),
  961:     ok = application:stop(app1),
  962:     ok = application:unload(app1),
  963:     ok.
  964: 
  965: %% Test application:ensure_all_started/1-2-3.
  966: ensure_all_started(_Conf) ->
  967:     do_ensure_all_started(serial),
  968:     do_ensure_all_started(concurrent),
  969:     ok.
  970: 
  971: do_ensure_all_started(Mode) ->
  972:     {ok, Fd1} = file:open("app1.app", [write]),
  973:     w_app1(Fd1),
  974:     file:close(Fd1),
  975:     {ok, Fd9} = file:open("app9.app", [write]),
  976:     w_app9(Fd9),
  977:     file:close(Fd9),
  978:     {ok, Fd10} = file:open("app10.app", [write]),
  979:     w_app10(Fd10, [app9], []),
  980:     file:close(Fd10),
  981:     {ok, FdErr} = file:open("app_chain_error.app", [write]),
  982:     w_app(FdErr, app_chain_error()),
  983:     file:close(FdErr),
  984:     {ok, FdErr2} = file:open("app_chain_error2.app", [write]),
  985:     w_app(FdErr2, app_chain_error2()),
  986:     file:close(FdErr2),
  987: 
  988:     %% Single app start/stop
  989:     false = lists:keyfind(app1, 1, application:which_applications()),
  990:     {ok, [app1]} = application:ensure_all_started(app1, temporary, Mode), % app1 started
  991:     {app1, _, _} = lists:keyfind(app1, 1, application:which_applications()),
  992:     {ok, []} = application:ensure_all_started(app1, temporary), % no start needed
  993:     {ok, []} = application:ensure_all_started(app1, permanent), % no start needed
  994:     ok = application:stop(app1),
  995:     false = lists:keyfind(app1, 1, application:which_applications()),
  996:     ok = application:unload(app1),
  997: 
  998:     %% App or dependency not found.
  999:     Name = hopefully_not_an_existing_app_file,
 1000:     {error,{Name, {"no such file or directory", _ }}} =
 1001: 	application:ensure_all_started(Name),
 1002: 
 1003:     %% Start dependencies.
 1004:     {error, {not_started, app9}} = application:start(app10),
 1005:     {ok, [app9,app10]} = application:ensure_all_started(app10, temporary, Mode),
 1006:     {app9, _, _} = lists:keyfind(app9, 1, application:which_applications()),
 1007:     {app10, _, _} = lists:keyfind(app10, 1, application:which_applications()),
 1008:     %% Only report apps/dependencies that actually needed to start
 1009:     ok = application:stop(app10),
 1010:     ok = application:unload(app10),
 1011:     {ok, [app10]} = application:ensure_all_started(app10, temporary, Mode),
 1012:     ok = application:stop(app9),
 1013:     ok = application:unload(app9),
 1014:     ok = application:stop(app10),
 1015:     ok = application:unload(app10),
 1016: 
 1017:     %% Starts several
 1018:     {ok, StartedSeveral} = application:ensure_all_started([app1, app10], temporary, Mode),
 1019:     [app1,app10,app9] = lists:sort(StartedSeveral),
 1020:     {app1, _, _} = lists:keyfind(app1, 1, application:which_applications()),
 1021:     {app9, _, _} = lists:keyfind(app9, 1, application:which_applications()),
 1022:     {app10, _, _} = lists:keyfind(app10, 1, application:which_applications()),
 1023:     ok = application:stop(app1),
 1024:     ok = application:unload(app1),
 1025:     ok = application:stop(app9),
 1026:     ok = application:unload(app9),
 1027:     ok = application:stop(app10),
 1028:     ok = application:unload(app10),
 1029: 
 1030:     %% Deeper failure chain. We have the following dependencies:
 1031:     %% app_chain_error -> app_chain_error2
 1032:     %% app_chain_error2 -> app10
 1033:     %% app_chain_error2 -> hopefully_not_an_existing_app
 1034:     %% app10 -> app 9
 1035:     %% First we have none running and we expect to have neither app9
 1036:     %% nor app10 running after failing to start
 1037:     %% hopefully_not_an_existing_app
 1038:     {error, {hopefully_not_an_existing_app, {"no such file or directory", _}}}=
 1039: 	application:ensure_all_started(app_chain_error, temporary, Mode),
 1040:     false = lists:keyfind(app9, 1, application:which_applications()),
 1041:     false = lists:keyfind(app10, 1, application:which_applications()),
 1042:     false = lists:keyfind(app_chain_error2, 1, application:which_applications()),
 1043:     false = lists:keyfind(app_chain_error, 1, application:which_applications()),
 1044:     %% Here we will have app9 already running, and app10 should be
 1045:     %% able to boot fine.
 1046:     %% In this dependency failing, we expect app9 to still be running, but
 1047:     %% not app10 after failing to start hopefully_not_an_existing_app
 1048:     {ok, [app9]} = application:ensure_all_started(app9, temporary, Mode),
 1049:     {error, {hopefully_not_an_existing_app, {"no such file or directory", _}}}=
 1050: 	application:ensure_all_started(app_chain_error),
 1051:     {app9, _, _} = lists:keyfind(app9, 1, application:which_applications()),
 1052:     false = lists:keyfind(app10, 1, application:which_applications()),
 1053:     false = lists:keyfind(app_chain_error2,1,application:which_applications()),
 1054:     false = lists:keyfind(app_chain_error, 1, application:which_applications()),
 1055:     ok = application:stop(app9),
 1056:     ok = application:unload(app9),
 1057:     ok = application:unload(app10),
 1058:     ok = application:unload(app_chain_error2),
 1059:     ok = application:unload(app_chain_error),
 1060:     ok.
 1061: 
 1062: optional_applications(_Conf) ->
 1063:     {ok, Fd10} = file:open("app10.app", [write]),
 1064:     w_app10(Fd10, [app9], []),
 1065:     file:close(Fd10),
 1066: 
 1067:     {error,{not_started,app9}} = application:start(app10),
 1068:     {ok, []} = application:get_key(app10, optional_applications),
 1069:     ok = application:unload(app10),
 1070: 
 1071:     %% List app9 as an optional application and app10 starts
 1072:     {ok, Fd10Opt} = file:open("app10.app", [write]),
 1073:     w_app10(Fd10Opt, [app9], [app9]),
 1074:     file:close(Fd10Opt),
 1075: 
 1076:     ok = application:start(app10),
 1077:     {ok, [app9]} = application:get_key(app10, optional_applications),
 1078:     false = lists:keymember(app9,1,application:which_applications()),
 1079: 
 1080:     ok = application:stop(app10),
 1081:     ok = application:unload(app10),
 1082: 
 1083:     %% If app9 is defined, we can still start app10 without app9
 1084:     {ok, Fd9} = file:open("app9.app", [write]),
 1085:     w_app9(Fd9),
 1086:     file:close(Fd9),
 1087: 
 1088:     ok = application:start(app10),
 1089:     false = lists:keymember(app9,1,application:which_applications()),
 1090: 
 1091:     ok = application:stop(app10),
 1092:     ok = application:unload(app10),
 1093: 
 1094:     %% But if we use ensure all started, then app9 is started too
 1095:     {ok, [app9, app10]} = application:ensure_all_started(app10, temporary),
 1096:     true = lists:keymember(app9,1,application:which_applications()),
 1097: 
 1098:     ok = application:stop(app9),
 1099:     ok = application:unload(app9),
 1100:     ok = application:stop(app10),
 1101:     ok = application:unload(app10),
 1102: 
 1103:     %% Finally, let's have an optional dependency with a start error
 1104:     {ok, Fd10Error} = file:open("app10.app", [write]),
 1105:     w_app10(Fd10Error, [app_start_error], [app_start_error]),
 1106:     file:close(Fd10Error),
 1107: 
 1108:     {ok, FdAppError} = file:open("app_start_error.app", [write]),
 1109:     w_app_start_error(FdAppError),
 1110:     file:close(FdAppError),
 1111: 
 1112:     {error,{app_start_error,_}} = application:ensure_all_started(app10, temporary),
 1113:     ok = application:unload(app10),
 1114:     ok.
 1115:

 1245: %% Ticket: OTP-2973
 1246: %% Slogan: application:start does not test if an appl is already starting...
 1247: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1248: %% Test of two processes simultaneously starting the same application.
 1249: otp_2973(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1250:     %% Write a .app file
 1251:     {ok, Fd} = file:open("app0.app", [write]),
 1252:     w_app(Fd, app0()),
 1253:     file:close(Fd),
 1254: 
 1255:     Pid1 =  spawn_link(?MODULE, init2973, []),
 1256:     Pid2 =  spawn_link(?MODULE, init2973, []),
 1257: 
 1258:     Pid1 ! {start, self(), app0},
 1259:     Pid2 ! {start, self(), app0},
 1260:     
 1261:     {Res1, Res2} = receive 
 1262: 			     {Pid1, res, Res1x} ->
 1263: 				 receive 
 1264: 				     {Pid2, res, Res2x} ->
 1265: 					 {Res1x, Res2x}
 1266: 				   after 2000 ->
 1267: 					   ct:fail(timeout_pid2)
 1268: 				   end;
 1269: 			     {Pid2, res, Res2x} ->
 1270: 				 receive 
 1271: 				     {Pid1, res, Res1x} ->
 1272: 					 {Res1x, Res2x}
 1273: 				 after 2000 ->
 1274: 					 ct:fail(timeout_pid1)
 1275: 				 end
 1276: 			 end,
 1277: 
 1278:     %% Stop it. Inteferes with other global.
 1279:     ok = application:stop(app0),
 1280: 
 1281:     %% Test result.
 1282:     case {Res1, Res2} of
 1283: 	{ok, ok} ->
 1284: 	    ok;
 1285: 	_ ->
 1286: 	    Txt = io_lib:format("Illegal results from start: ~p ~p ",
 1287: 				      [Res1, Res2]),
 1288: 	    ct:fail(lists:flatten(Txt))
 1289:     end,
 1290: 
 1291: 
 1292:     %% Write a .app file
 1293:     {ok, Fda} = file:open("app_start_error.app", [write]),
 1294:     w_app_start_error(Fda),
 1295:     file:close(Fda),
 1296: 
 1297:     Pid1 ! {start, self(), app_start_error},
 1298:     Pid2 ! {start, self(), app_start_error},
 1299:     
 1300:     {Res1a, Res2a} = receive 
 1301: 			       {Pid1, res, Res1y} ->
 1302: 				   receive 
 1303: 				       {Pid2, res, Res2y} ->
 1304: 					   {Res1y, Res2y}
 1305: 				   after 2000 ->
 1306: 					   ct:fail(timeout_pid2)
 1307: 				   end;
 1308: 			       {Pid2, res, Res2y} ->
 1309: 				   receive 
 1310: 				       {Pid1, res, Res1y} ->
 1311: 					   {Res1y, Res2y}
 1312: 				   after 2000 ->
 1313: 					   ct:fail(timeout_pid1)
 1314: 				   end
 1315: 			   end,
 1316: 
 1317:     case {Res1a, Res2a} of
 1318: 	{{error,{'start error',{app_start_error,start,[normal,[]]}}}, 
 1319: 	 {error,{'start error',{app_start_error,start,[normal,[]]}}}} ->
 1320: 	    ok;
 1321: 	_ ->
 1322: 	    Txta = io_lib:format("Illegal results from start ~p ~p ",[Res1a, Res2a]),
 1323: 	    ct:fail(lists:flatten(Txta))
 1324:     end,
 1325: 
 1326:     ok.

 1332: %% Slogan: crash the node if permanent appl has illegal env parameter values
 1333: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1334: %% When a distributed application is started the permit flag is checked
 1335: %% that the permit flag is not changed during the start.

 1337: otp_3184(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1338:     NodeNames = [Ncp1, Ncp2] = node_names([cp1, cp2], Conf),

 1340:     WithSyncTime = config_fun(config3184(NodeNames)),
 1341: 
 1342:     %% Test [cp1, cp2]
 1343:     {ok, Cp1} = start_node_config(Ncp1, NoSyncTime, Conf),
 1344:     {ok, Cp2} = start_node_config(Ncp2, WithSyncTime, Conf),
 1345:     wait_for_ready_net(),

 1348:     {[ok,ok],[]} = 
 1349:         rpc:multicall([Cp1, Cp2], application, load, [app1()]),
 1350:     ct:sleep(3000),
 1351:     false = is_started(app1, Cp1),
 1352:     false = is_started(app1, Cp2),
 1353: 
 1354:     %% Start app1 on cp1
 1355:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, permit, [app1, true]),
 1356:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, start, [app1, permanent]),
 1357:     ok = rpc:call(Cp2, application, start, [app1, permanent]),
 1358:     ?UNTIL(is_started(app1, Cp1)),
 1359:     false = is_started(app1, Cp2),
 1360:     
 1361:     %% Check that the application is marked as running in application_controller
 1362:     X = rpc:call(Cp1, application_controller, info, []),
 1363:     {value, {running, Xrunning}} = lists:keysearch(running, 1, X),
 1364:     {value, Xapp1} = lists:keysearch(app1, 1, Xrunning),
 1365:     {app1, _Xpid} = Xapp1,
 1366:

 1370:     {app1, {distributed, Cp1}} = Yapp1,
 1371: 
 1372:     stop_node_nice(Cp1),
 1373:     stop_node_nice(Cp2),
 1374:     ok.

 1376: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1377: %% Ticket: OTP-3002
 1378: %% Slogan: crash the node if permanent appl has illegal env parameter values
 1379: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1380: %% crash the node if permanent appl has illegal env parameter values.
 1381: otp_3002(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1382:     %% Create the boot script
 1383:     {{KernelVer,StdlibVer}, {LatestDir, LatestName}} =
 1384: 	create_script_3002("script_3002"),
 1385:     ct:pal(?HI_VERBOSITY, "LatestDir = ~p~n", [LatestDir]),
 1386:     ct:pal(?HI_VERBOSITY, "LatestName = ~p~n", [LatestName]),
 1387: 
 1388:     case is_real_system(KernelVer, StdlibVer) of
 1389: 	      true ->
 1390: 		  Options = [];
 1391: 	      false  ->
 1392: 		  Options = [local]
 1393: 	  end,
 1394: 
 1395:     ok = systools:make_script("script_3002", Options),
 1396:     ok = systools:script2boot("script_3002"),
 1397: 
 1398:     {error, timeout} = start_node_boot_3002(cp1, "script_3002"),
 1399: 
 1400:     ok = file:delete("script_3002.boot"),
 1401:     ok = file:delete("script_3002.rel"),
 1402:     ok = file:delete("script_3002.script"),
 1403:     ok.
 1404: 
 1405: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1406: %% Ticket: OTP-4066
 1407: %% Slogan: dist_ac crashed if a distributed application that it
 1408: %%         didn't know of was stopped by another dist_ac (bad_match
 1409: %%         when it received dist_ac_app_stopped).
 1410: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1411: 
 1412: %% Check that application stop don't cause dist_ac crash.
 1413: otp_4066(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1414:     %% Write config files
 1415:     [Ncp1, Ncp2] = node_names([cp1, cp2], Conf),
 1416:     Host = from($@, atom_to_list(node())),
 1417:     Cp1 = list_to_atom(Ncp1 ++ "@" ++ Host),
 1418:     Cp2 = list_to_atom(Ncp2 ++ "@" ++ Host),
 1419:     AllNodes = [Cp1, Cp2],
 1420:     App1Nodes = {app1, AllNodes},
 1421: 
 1422:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Conf),
 1423:     {ok, FdC} = file:open(filename:join(Dir, "otp_4066.config"), [write]),
 1424:     write_config(FdC, config_4066(AllNodes, 5000, [App1Nodes])),
 1425:     file:close(FdC),
 1426: 
 1427:     %% Write the app1.app file
 1428:     {ok, FdA12} = file:open(filename:join(Dir, "app1.app"), [write]),
 1429:     w_app1(FdA12),
 1430:     file:close(FdA12),
 1431: 
 1432:     Args1 = "-pa " ++ Dir ++ " -config " ++ filename:join(Dir, "otp_4066"),
 1433:     Args2 =  "-pa " ++ Dir ++ " -kernel start_dist_ac true",
 1434: 
 1435:     {ok, Cp2} = start_node_args(Ncp2, Args2),
 1436:     %% Cp1 syncs with cp2 (which is known to be up).
 1437:     {ok, Cp1} = start_node_args(Ncp1, Args1),
 1438:     wait_for_ready_net(),
 1439: 
 1440:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, start, [app1]),
 1441:     wait_until_started(app1, [Cp1]),
 1442:     io:format("--- App1 started at Cp1 ---~n", []),
 1443:     print_dac_state(AllNodes),
 1444: 
 1445:     %% Cp2 previously crashed on this stop
 1446:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, stop, [app1]),
 1447:     wait_until_stopped(app1, [Cp1]),
 1448:     io:format("--- App1 stopped at Cp1 ---~n", []),
 1449:     print_dac_state(AllNodes),
 1450: 
 1451:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, start, [app1]),
 1452:     wait_until_started(app1, [Cp1]),
 1453:     io:format("--- App1 started at Cp1 ---~n", []),
 1454:     print_dac_state(AllNodes),
 1455: 
 1456:     ok = rpc:call(Cp2, application, load, [app1, App1Nodes]),
 1457:     ok = rpc:call(Cp2, application, start, [app1]),
 1458:     io:format("--- App1 started at Cp2 ---~n", []),
 1459:     print_dac_state(AllNodes),
 1460: 
 1461: 
 1462:     stop_node_nice(Cp1),
 1463:     wait_until_started(app1, [Cp2]),
 1464:     io:format("--- Cp1 crashed; failover to Cp2  ---~n", []),
 1465:     print_dac_state(Cp2),
 1466: 
 1467:     stop_node_nice(Cp2),
 1468:     ok.
 1469: 
 1470: config_4066(SyncNodesOptional, SyncNodesTimeout, Distributed) ->
 1471:     [{kernel, [{sync_nodes_optional,SyncNodesOptional},
 1472: 	       {sync_nodes_timeout, SyncNodesTimeout},
 1473: 	       {distributed, Distributed}]}].
 1474: 
 1475: write_config(Fd, Config) ->
 1476:     io:format(Fd, "~p.~n", [Config]).
 1477: 
 1478: print_dac_state(Node) when is_atom(Node) ->
 1479:     State = gen_server:call({dist_ac, Node}, info),
 1480:     io:format(" * dist_ac state on node ~p:~n    ~p~n",
 1481:                        [Node, State]);
 1482: print_dac_state(Nodes) when is_list(Nodes) ->
 1483:     lists:foreach(fun (N) -> print_dac_state(N) end, Nodes).
 1484: 				
 1485: 
 1486: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1487: %% Ticket: OTP-4227
 1488: %% Slogan: Bad return value from application.
 1489: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1490: %% Test start of depending app when required app crashed.
 1491: otp_4227(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1492:     NodeNames = [Ncp1, Ncp2] = node_names([cp1, cp2], Conf),
 1493:     NoSyncTime = config_fun_fast(config_4227(NodeNames)),
 1494:     WithSyncTime = config_fun(config_4227(NodeNames)),
 1495: 
 1496:     %% Test [cp1, cp2]
 1497:     {ok, Cp1} = start_node_config(Ncp1, NoSyncTime, Conf),
 1498:     {ok, Cp2} = start_node_config(Ncp2, WithSyncTime, Conf),
 1499:     Cps = [Cp1, Cp2],
 1500:     wait_for_ready_net(),
 1501: 
 1502:     %% Try to start app10 which should fail since app9 is not started
 1503:     {[ok,ok],[]} = 
 1504:         rpc:multicall(Cps, application, load, [app9()]),
 1505:     ?UNTIL(is_loaded(app9, Cps)),
 1506:     {[ok,ok],[]} = 
 1507:         rpc:multicall(Cps, application, load, [app10([app9], [])]),
 1508:     {error, {not_started, app9}} = 
 1509: 	rpc:call(Cp1, application, start, [app10]),
 1510: 
 1511:     %% Start app9 and brutally kill it, then try to start app10
 1512:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, start, [app9]),
 1513:     ct:sleep(1000),
 1514:     Pid9 = rpc:call(Cp1, erlang, whereis, [ch_sup19]),
 1515:     true = erlang:is_pid(Pid9),
 1516:     true = erlang:exit(Pid9, kill),
 1517:     ct:sleep(1000),
 1518: 
 1519:     %% This gave {error, no_report} before the patch
 1520:     {error, {not_running, app9}} = 
 1521: 	rpc:call(Cp1, application, start, [app10]),
 1522: 
 1523:     stop_node_nice(Cp1),
 1524:     stop_node_nice(Cp2),
 1525:     ok.
 1526: 
 1527: config_4227([Ncp1, Ncp2]) ->
 1528:     fun(Fd, SyncNodesTimeout) ->
 1529:             M = from($@, atom_to_list(node())),
 1530:             io:format(Fd, 
 1531:                       "[{kernel, "
 1532:                       "  [{sync_nodes_optional, ['~s@~s','~s@~s']},"
 1533:                       "   {sync_nodes_timeout, ~w},"
 1534:                       "   {start_dist_ac, true},"
 1535:                       "   {distributed, "
 1536:                       "    [{app9,  ['~s@~s','~s@~s']}, "
 1537:                       "     {app10, ['~s@~s','~s@~s']}]}]}].~n",
 1538:                       [Ncp1, M, Ncp2, M,  
 1539:                        SyncNodesTimeout,  
 1540:                        Ncp1, M, Ncp2, M,  
 1541:                        Ncp1, M, Ncp2, M])
 1542:     end.
 1543: 
 1544: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1545: %% Ticket: OTP-5363
 1546: %% Slogan: Slow termination in application_master
 1547: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1548: otp_5363(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1549:     %% When stopping an application, all processes having the
 1550:     %% application master as group leader should get killed.
 1551:     %% The killing was done in an inefficient way.
 1552:     %%   In this test case, we will not test the efficiency of
 1553:     %% the code, but only that the correct processes ARE killed.
 1554: 
 1555:     OldPath = code:get_path(),
 1556:     code:add_patha(proplists:get_value(data_dir,Conf)),
 1557:     try
 1558: 	ok = application:load(app_group_leader()),
 1559: 	ok = application:start(group_leader),
 1560: 	case whereis(nisse) of
 1561: 		  Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 1562: 		      Mref = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 1563: 		      ok = application:stop(group_leader),
 1564: 		      receive
 1565: 			  {'DOWN',Mref,_,_,_} -> ok
 1566: 		      end,
 1567: 		      undefined = whereis(nisse);
 1568: 		  Bad ->
 1569: 		      io:format("~p\n", [Bad]),
 1570: 		      ct:fail(failed)
 1571: 	      end
 1572:     after
 1573:         code:set_path(OldPath)
 1574:     end,
 1575:     ok.
 1576: 
 1577: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1578: %% Ticket: OTP-5606
 1579: %% Slogan: Problems with starting a distributed application
 1580: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1581: %% Test of several processes simultaneously starting the same
 1582: %% distributed application.
 1583: otp_5606(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1584: 
 1585:     %% Write a config file
 1586:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Conf),
 1587:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(filename:join(Dir, "sys.config"), [write]),
 1588:     NodeNames = [Ncp1, Ncp2] = node_names([cp1, cp2], Conf),
 1589:     (config4(NodeNames))(Fd, 10000),
 1590:     file:close(Fd),
 1591:     Config = filename:join(Dir, "sys"),
 1592:     
 1593:     %% Test [cp1, cp2]
 1594:     {ok, Cp1} = start_node(Ncp1, Config),
 1595:     {ok, Cp2} = start_node(Ncp2, Config),
 1596:     Cps = [Cp1, Cp2],
 1597:     wait_for_ready_net(),
 1598: 
 1599:     %% Load app1 on both nodes
 1600:     {[ok, ok], []} =
 1601: 	rpc:multicall(Cps, application, load, [app1()]),
 1602: 
 1603:     %% Attempt to start app1 from different processes simultaneously
 1604:     Pid11 =  spawn_link(Cp1, ?MODULE, loop5606, [self()]),
 1605:     Pid12 =  spawn_link(Cp1, ?MODULE, loop5606, [self()]),
 1606:     Pid13 =  spawn_link(Cp1, ?MODULE, loop5606, [self()]),
 1607:     Pid2  =  spawn_link(Cp2, ?MODULE, loop5606, [self()]),
 1608: 
 1609:     Pid2 ! start,
 1610:     Pid11 ! start,
 1611:     Pid12 ! start,
 1612:     Pid13 ! start,
 1613: 
 1614:     ResL = otp_5606_loop([]),
 1615: 
 1616:     case ResL of
 1617: 	[ok, ok, ok, ok] ->
 1618: 	    ok;
 1619: 	[Res1, Res2, Res3, Res4] ->
 1620: 	    Txt = io_lib:format("Illegal results from start ~p ~p ~p ~p",
 1621: 				[Res1, Res2, Res3, Res4]),
 1622: 	    ct:fail(lists:flatten(Txt))
 1623:     end,
 1624: 
 1625:     {error, {already_started, app1}} = 
 1626: 	rpc:call(Cp1, application, start, [app1]),
 1627: 
 1628:     stop_node_nice(Cp1),
 1629:     stop_node_nice(Cp2),
 1630:     ok.
 1631: 
 1632: otp_5606_loop(ResL) when length(ResL)<4 ->
 1633:     receive 
 1634: 	{_Pid, Res} ->
 1635: 	    otp_5606_loop([Res|ResL])
 1636:     after 5000 ->
 1637: 	    ct:fail(timeout_waiting_for_res)
 1638:     end;
 1639: otp_5606_loop(ResL) ->
 1640:     ResL.
 1641: 
 1642: loop5606(Pid) ->
 1643:     receive
 1644: 	start ->
 1645: 	    Res = application:start(app1),
 1646: 	    Pid ! {self(), Res}
 1647:     end.
 1648: 
 1649: otp_16504(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1650:     {ok, Fd} = file:open("app1.app", [write]),
 1651:     w_app1(Fd),
 1652:     file:close(Fd),
 1653:     register(test_application_stop_called, self()),
 1654: 
 1655:     ok = application:ensure_started(app1),
 1656:     Master = application_controller:get_master(app1),
 1657:     exit(Master, kill),
 1658:     receive
 1659:         {stop_called, _} ->
 1660:             ok
 1661:     after 3000 ->
 1662:             ct:fail(stop_not_called)
 1663:     end,
 1664:     ok.
 1665: 
 1666: %% Tests get_env/* functions.
 1667: get_env(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1668:     ok = application:set_env(kernel, new_var, new_val),
 1669:     {ok, new_val} = application:get_env(kernel, new_var),
 1670:     undefined = application:get_env(undefined_app, a),
 1671:     undefined = application:get_env(kernel, error_logger_xyz),
 1672:     default   = application:get_env(kernel, error_logger_xyz, default),
 1673:     ok.
 1674: 
 1675: get_supervisor(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1676:     undefined = application:get_supervisor(stdlib),
 1677:     {ok, Pid} = application:get_supervisor(kernel),
 1678:     Pid = erlang:whereis(kernel_sup),
 1679:     ok.
 1680:

 1682: %% Should be started in a CC view with:
 1683: %% erl -sname XXX -rsh ctrsh where XX not in [cp1, cp2, cp3]
 1684: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1685: %% Tests read the .app keys.
 1686: get_key(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1687:     NodeNames = [Ncp1, _Ncp2, _Ncp3] = node_names([cp1, cp2, cp3], Conf),
 1688:     WithSyncTime = config_fun(config_inc(NodeNames)),
 1689: 
 1690:     %% Test [cp1, cp2, cp3]
 1691:     {ok, Cp1} = start_node_config(Ncp1, WithSyncTime, Conf),
 1692: 
 1693:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, load, [appinc(), d3(NodeNames)]),
 1694:     ?UNTIL(is_loaded(appinc, Cp1)),
 1695:     ok = rpc:call(Cp1, application, start, [appinc, permanent]),
 1696:     ?UNTIL(is_started(appinc, Cp1)),
 1697:     
 1698:     {ok, "Test of new app file, including appnew"} =
 1699: 	rpc:call(Cp1, application, get_key, [appinc, description]),
 1700:     {ok, "CXC 138 ai"} = rpc:call(Cp1, application, get_key, [appinc ,id]),
 1701:     {ok, "2.0"} = rpc:call(Cp1, application, get_key, [appinc, vsn]),
 1702:     {ok, [kernel]} = rpc:call(Cp1, application, get_key, [appinc, applications]),
 1703:     {ok, [appinc1, appinc2]} = 
 1704: 	rpc:call(Cp1, application, get_key, [appinc, included_applications]),
 1705:     {ok, []} = rpc:call(Cp1, application, get_key, [appinc, registered]),
 1706:     {ok, [{init, [kalle]}, {takeover, []}, {go, [sune]}]} =
 1707: 	rpc:call(Cp1, application, get_key, [appinc, start_phases]),
 1708:     {ok, Env} = rpc:call(Cp1, application, get_key, [appinc ,env]),
 1709:     [{own2,val2},{own_env1,value1}] = lists:sort(Env),
 1710:     {ok, []} = rpc:call(Cp1, application, get_key, [appinc, modules]),
 1711:     {ok, {application_starter, [ch_sup, {appinc, 41, 43}] }} = 
 1712: 	rpc:call(Cp1, application, get_key, [appinc, mod]),
 1713:     {ok, infinity} = rpc:call(Cp1, application, get_key, [appinc, maxP]),
 1714:     {ok, infinity} = rpc:call(Cp1, application, get_key, [appinc, maxT]),
 1715:     undefined = rpc:call(Cp1, application, get_key, [appinc, very_unknown]),
 1716: 
 1717:     {ok, [{description, "Test of new app file, including appnew"}, 
 1718: 		{id, "CXC 138 ai"}, 
 1719: 		{vsn, "2.0"}, 
 1720: 		{modules, []}, 
 1721: 		{maxP, infinity}, 
 1722: 		{maxT, infinity}, 
 1723: 		{registered, []}, 
 1724: 		{included_applications, [appinc1, appinc2]}, 
 1725: 		{optional_applications, []},
 1726: 		{applications, [kernel]}, 
 1727: 		{env, Env}, 
 1728: 		{mod, {application_starter, [ch_sup, {appinc, 41, 43}] }}, 
 1729: 		{start_phases, [{init, [kalle]}, {takeover, []}, {go, [sune]}]}]} = 
 1730: 	rpc:call(Cp1, application, get_all_key, [appinc]),
 1731:     [{own2,val2},{own_env1,value1}] = lists:sort(Env),
 1732: 
 1733:     {ok, "Test of new app file, including appnew"} =
 1734: 	gen_server:call({global, {ch,41}}, {get_pid_key, description}),
 1735:     {ok, "CXC 138 ai"} = 
 1736: 	gen_server:call({global, {ch,41}}, {get_pid_key, id}),
 1737:     {ok, "2.0"} = 
 1738: 	gen_server:call({global, {ch,41}}, {get_pid_key, vsn}),
 1739:     {ok, [kernel]} = 
 1740: 	gen_server:call({global, {ch,41}}, {get_pid_key, applications}),
 1741:     {ok, [appinc1, appinc2]} = 
 1742: 	gen_server:call({global, {ch,41}}, {get_pid_key, included_applications}),
 1743:     {ok, []} = 
 1744: 	gen_server:call({global, {ch,41}}, {get_pid_key, registered}),
 1745:     {ok, [{init, [kalle]}, {takeover, []}, {go, [sune]}]} =
 1746: 	gen_server:call({global, {ch,41}}, {get_pid_key, start_phases}),

 1751:     {ok, {application_starter, [ch_sup, {appinc, 41, 43}] }} = 
 1752: 	gen_server:call({global, {ch,41}}, {get_pid_key, mod}),

 1759:

 1763: 		{id, "CXC 138 ai"}, 
 1764: 		{vsn, "2.0"},
